title: dVRK teleop ecm
description:
Configuration file format for the dVRK ECM tele-operation component.  See the [dVRK wiki](https://dvrk.readthedocs.io).  This schema is used for the [dVRK console configuration](dvrk-console.html).

 - For details of implementation, see code under `sawIntuitiveResearchKit/core/components/code/mtsTeleOperationECM.cpp`
 - [Schema file](dvrk-teleop-ecm.schema.json)

scale.description: Scale factor applied to insertion motion
